page.title: 11ARMED FORCES
page.content: {PRINCESS MARGARET'S VISIT TO WYESHAM A{British Legion sheltered housing complex named{HAMMET COURT,Wyesham}was officially opened by H.R.H.Princess Margaret on the 10th May 1985. On Friday 10th May 1985 H.R.H.Princess Margaret of the Royal Family visited the Monmouth Castle and had lunch. Then at about 2 p.m. H.R.H.visited Hammett Court. The television crew were around filming the event. Everybody was there, including our School. At last Princess Margaret drew the curtains on a plaque, which officially opened Hammett Court, for people who served in H.M.Forces, and their widows. The{Band of the Welsh {Guards}played on this occasion.
